name: InsideManoria
description:
ඞ Story ඞ 

Hi Tony, you entered this big mansion because you love mysteries but there is no electricity here and this place looks very mysterious and scary. Remember, Tony, this isn't your first time entering terrifying grand mansions and houses. Tony you believe there is something mysterious going on here. Tony you want to find a treasure or something valuable here. This huge mysterious mansion has no electricity and Tony you only have a flashlight. Your goal: Find the mysterious things in this mansion and turn on the lights!     

Ο Controls Ο

WASD & Arrow Keys - Walk

ESC & P - Menu

E - Interaction

◊ Developer ◊

  • Arda Dizman - Game Developer & Level Designer
